step_feedback.feedback: Great job sitting or standing comfortably! Keep your hands on your abdomen as instructed.
You're doing well placing your hands on your abdomen. Remember to keep them there for the next step.
Excellent work tightening your whole body muscles while inhaling through your nose. Keep visualizing the fluid moving to your chest.
Fantastic job relaxing your muscles and exhaling through your mouth. Continue visualizing pushing fluid out with each exhale.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with your deep breathing exercises! Remember to keep your whole body muscles tight as you inhale and relax them as you exhale. This helps move fluid effectively.
